item.title: Euler's Identity (GPT-4.5 Generated)
item.description: Euler’s identity is often celebrated as one of mathematics’ most beautiful equations: e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0 At first glance, this elegant formula may seem mysterious or even paradoxical ...

item.title: Welcome to my page.
item.description: Hello, I’m Louis. I’m a lot of things, but one of the things that I am is a PhD candidate in philosophy. [Testing GitHub Actions - Updated at 2024] I will be using the space to share my notes on various topics.
